Hello Hagop,

The wait is nearly over! Weâ€™re just one day away from the CIPS MENA Conference & Excellence in Procurement & Supply Awards 2025, the most anticipated gathering of procurement and supply chain professionals across the region.

Whether youâ€™re coming for inspiration, networking, innovation - or all three - your ticket gives you access to an unforgettable day. 

This is your key to unlock the world of procurement and supply chain within the Kingdom. Be amongst 2,000+ senior leaders within the profession, network with key decision-makers, recognise excellence in 20 award categories, hear from over 40+ international speakers and explore exclusive offerings on our exhibition floor. 
REGISTER NOW <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/vAdsCDJmnfn7oNjuZsmfjndE7?domain=app.cipscomms.org>  
 <https://image.cipscomms.org/EloquaImages/clients/CharteredInstituteofProcurementSupply/%7B9996b27d-03c0-495f-b57b-6cadc6511cb4%7D_2.png> 	
ğŸ¤ Conference & Exhibition Access: FREE to attend! 

Your ticket gives you full access to:


*	Keynotes from global and regional procurement leaders
*	Interactive panels on leadership, sustainability, AI, and transformation in supply chains
*	A vibrant exhibition floor featuring cutting-edge solutions and tools
*	Networking with 2,000+ professionals driving the profession forward

Timings:
Conference opens at 9:00 AM and runs through 4:30 PM. Registration opens at 8:00 AM.
